author: mbautin
msg: Instrument read blocks to check for the time we spend for loading

author: mbautin
msg: Test Plan: make dummy KVAggregator and check whether it works (TestKeyValueAggregator unit test added)

author: mbautin
msg: JIRA HBASE-6770: Allow scanner to specify the response size
Summary: Allow scanner to specify the request size rather than set both batch and caching to control the response size, and it can also specify whether the row can be truncated or not.
Test Plan: unitTest and add TestFromClientSide4.java to test the new fields (maxRequestSize, partialRow)
